suggested_project.title: Echoes Across the Lighthouse
suggested_project.description: A thematic collection exploring time, lighthouses, and the ocean, weaving together recurring motifs into a cohesive narrative or poetic anthology.
suggested_project.based_on: Recurring patterns of 'time', 'lighthouse', and 'ocean' across multiple standalone pieces.

decisions: Initiate a new project to begin balancing toward the 70% project work target.
Base the first project on the strongest recurring motifs (time, lighthouse, ocean) for creative cohesion.
Monitor for further recurring themes to inspire future projects.
Maintain some standalone creation for continued diversity and ideation.
